User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the bakery canteen system.

credit_balance.description: The current credit balance of the user.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed in the bakery canteen system.

items.description: A list of items in the order.

amount.description: The total amount of the order.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the order was placed.

Inventory.title: Inventory
Inventory.description: Represents an item in the bakery canteen's inventory.

name.description: The name of the inventory item.

current_amount.description: The current amount of the item in stock.

threshold.description: The threshold amount for the item, below which an alert is triggered.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user data. Includes user ID, name, and credit balance.

/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores order data. Includes order number, user ID, items, amount, and timestamp.

/inventory/{inventoryId}.description: Stores inventory item data. Includes item name, current amount, and threshold.
